fullText:
Ferocious Frenzy

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite: Minotaur, Ferocity racial trait
Benefit: When you drop to 0 hit points or fewer, you can make a melee basic attack against each enemy adjacent to you with a -2 penalty to the attack rolls instead of making the attack Ferocity grants you.

Published in Dragon Magazine 385, page(s) 21.
